title: Execute Blast Pattern
description: A blast crew foreman oversees the execution of a designed blast, including drilling the holes and charging them with explosives.

tasks.description: Verify that the drill rig has accurately drilled the holes according to the designed pattern using GPS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms all holes are drilled within the specified tolerance.

tasks.description: Supervise the charging of each hole with the correct amount and type of explosive as per the loading sheet.
tasks.expected_outcome: All holes are safely charged according to the plan.

tasks.description: Clear the blast area of all personnel and equipment and then fire the blast at the scheduled time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The blast is executed safely and successfully.
